long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Homework Helper: Seamlessly Integrated with Any Website or Learning Management System

Click, Relax & Succeed: Your Stress-Free Solution for Quizzes

StudyTool is the ultimate exam assistant that integrates seamlessly with your LMS. Powered by advanced AI algorithms, our software delivers precise quiz and homework solutions, freeing up your time to focus on understanding the material and achieving your academic goals.

Whether you're just starting college or nearing graduation, StudyTool is here to help you stay on track and succeed with our discreet Chrome extension designed for college exams.

Multi-Platform Compatibility
StudyTool works effortlessly with popular platforms like, Canvas, McGraw Hill, Blackboard,, Moodle, and many others.

Snapshot
Capture any question from any website with ease and get instant answers within the extension popup, making it the perfect tool for multiple-choice question solving.

Text Selection
Simply highlight any question on any website, right-click on the highlighted text, and select "Ask StudyTool." A popup will then appear, displaying the correct answer to the question.

Detailed Explanation
Receive in-depth explanations to help you grasp the core concepts and logic behind each solution.

Stealth Mode
For complete discretion, this mode fully integrates the software into the platform's elements, leaving no trace of our logo.

User Privacy
We prioritize your privacy by ensuring the exam assistant remains undetectable on compatible platforms. All user data is always anonymized.

Solved Questions History
Review and revisit recently solved questions to strengthen your understanding. Discover the logic behind the answers, which can be invaluable for exam prep.

Do Not Track
Opt for this feature to prevent future questions from being added to your solved questions history on the dashboard.

Need Assistance?
Reach out to us at support@studytool.io
